<title level="1" right="Hazard 19" pfs="">[Vorpal Executioner](/Hazards.aspx?ID=486)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A wickedly sharp saw blade descends and travels along grooves in a complex path throughout the room, attempting to decapitate everyone within.

---

**Stealth**
DC 43 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 41 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (expert) at four different junctions to jam all the saw blade’s possible paths, preventing it from traveling through the room

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 43, **Fort** +32, **Ref** +32

**Hardness**
30

**HP**
120 (BT 60) per junction

**Immunities**
[critical hits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2190), [object immunities](/Rules.aspx?ID=2161), precision damage

</column>

**Total Decapitation** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature attempts to exit the room; **Effect** The saw blade travels along its path, making one [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) against each creature in the room, twisting and varying its height for a maximum chance of beheading its targets.

**Melee** saw blade +40 ([deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=570), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571)), **Damage** 6d12+25 slashing plus decapitation; no multiple attack penalty 

**Decapitation** On a critical hit, a target must succeed at a DC 39 Fortitude save or be decapitated, dying instantly unless it can survive without a head

---
**Reset**
The trap resets over the course of the round and can be triggered again 1 round later.
